name: Tashigi
text: On Play If your leader is [Smoker], give up to one of your opponent's characters -4 cost for this turn. Activate: Main Once Per Turn If it is the turn this character was played, place up to one of your opponent's cost 0 characters into its owner's trash.

effect.text: If your leader is [Smoker], give up to one of your opponent's characters -4 cost for this turn.
If it is the turn this character was played, place up to one of your opponent's cost 0 characters into its owner's trash.
